help1:
Two ways to use App:
 
1. BEST WAY:  Touch any questions on screens that appear. Then touch message title for your message. Repeat if necessary.
 
OR
 
2.  Touch menu, search and type one word in search engine that describes your current feelings. Examples of such words might be angry, fear, lonely, resentful, craving, urge, stress, and many more…Then touch a message.
help2: Touch a question that may apply. Quickly scroll through the list to find one.
help3: Touch a title that speaks to you. Quickly scroll through the list to find one. After reading the message that appears, if you need more than one message to change your troubled thinking to healing thinking, touch another title for a new message.
